text:
er signs during home isolation. 
Worsening symptoms include difficulty breathing/talking, coughing blood, chest pain, unremitting fever, dizziness, 
confusion, and obstetric warning signs. 
If present, she should call a local facility or the Helpline 0800 029 999 
The emergency services and the receiving facility should be informed that the woman is in self-isolation for COVID-19 
so that IPC measures can be adhered to during transfer and arrival at the facility. 
COVID-19 confirmed
